reviews.review_msg: everyone who took his midterm and studied hard ended up having mid 60%...now...is that our fault as "always"? or finally..will someone open their damn eyes and see that this prof is unfair teacher, midterm creator and marker...

Bad Prof. he occasionally comes in with a hang over.  NO one is able to read what he writes and when he makes tests he is in his own little world.  Meaning that his test are only 5% linked to lectures, and everything else is irrelevant.
hard to understand, too much test and homework.
Sometimes gets confused in class about the material he is teaching, loses focus, but definitely a career academic!

He covered the material very well and clearly in class.  He brought in his own research which made the otherwise dry material very interesting and easy to understand.  The tests related well to the material and the assignments were fun and relevant to the class content.

Kevin is one of the nicest teachers. He is very calm & any questions or concerns you may have that you present to him, he makes sure your questions are answered & that you have a complete understanding. During lectures, he speaks slowly & explains EVERYTHING in detail.

Although Prof Jodi uses the textbook, but she did use examples from other sources. I think she does explain the material well and she is a very reasonable professor in terms of grades and due dates for assignments. Her exam is not very tough BUT her wording for her questions in the exam are confusing. You may be confused when doing her exams.

Jamal is by far my favourite prof at SFU! She is super passionate about what she teaches and is extremely helpful. If you study, go to lectures, takes notes, and attend the labs, you should have no problems getting a good mark. Her exams are fair. Use her office hours, she is more than happy to help. I thought it was the easiest A+ I ever got!

Awesome Prof ever! He speaks so clearly and slowly then repeats few times of what he've said so everyone could copy the notes on the overhead and what he said at the same time! Good powerpoints as well. He is very nice too!
Awesome prof! Super helpful and he knows the material. I learnt a lot from his class. he makes things clear and will go over things slowly.
Helpful teacher. He will spend time with you if you go to his office. I learned alot from talking to him.

holy crap! make sure you LOVE psych to take this course. the materials are brutal and confusing! he is the most montoned person i've ever had to listen to. however, hes nice, friendly, funny, and he tells you what he wants from you on midterms and assigns. mabye sure to drink coffee before this class because you might fall asleep
Good! funny at times too. he seems interested in the material, which can be a little boring,it is a methods course after all.nice blue shoes!:)
he talks so slow during class!!!!! you're going to fall asleep!
Awesome! Clear lectures tho I wish he posted his notes on line. Not 2 bad tho because he does'nt have many lecture slides. Midterm was easy! Cute and rides a motorcycle too!!
Good feedback and high interest in course materials
Great TA, amazing person and extremely helpful when help is needed! WOULD RECOMMEND
